description.translate: Among the crowd he knows how to hide, and without anyone seeing, he strikes.

items.nbt: {display:{Name:"\"§9Capuche suspecte\"","Lore":["{\"text\":\"§7Parmi la foule il sait se cacher,\"}","{\"text\":\"§7et sans que personne ne voit, il frappe.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7Among the crowd he knows how to hide,\"}","{\"text\":\"§7and without anyone seeing, he strikes.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7STR§a1 §7LUC§c-1\"}"],color:5507847}}
